solution_line_template: In the first week, {average_garbage_per_collection} * {collection_days_per_week} = <<{average_garbage_per_collection}*{collection_days_per_week}={garbage_first_week}>>{garbage_first_week} kilograms of garbage are accumulated.

In the second week, half the amount of garbage is accumulated, which is {garbage_first_week} / {reduction_factor_second_week} =<<{garbage_first_week}/{reduction_factor_second_week}={garbage_second_week}>>{garbage_second_week} kg of garbage.
During the 2 weeks, {garbage_first_week} + {garbage_second_week} = <<{garbage_first_week}+{garbage_second_week}={total_garbage_accumulated}>>{total_garbage_accumulated} kg of garbage are accumulated.
